channel.title: [377] Novation 24/7 VPS | Vbulletin Forums | Looking for Web Developer |
channel.description:
Welcome to Novation! Our RSPS has a lot to offer,Ranging from lots of customs,skilling opportunities, bossing, donator benefits.
We worked hard to get the server up and running, In Novation we want our players to have the best game experience they ever wanted and searched for! Like i said above we got a lot to offer with a great amount of custom items and a great team to support the community. We are even got a wiki that got a lot of guides to help if you are stuck with something and there is a lot of useful information to in prove your knowledge about the game. The staff team we got are people who are in the project since we started it all of them have a great RSPS experience and knowledge of RSPS. So with a great game and a great staff team we are happy to invite YOU to join us and get the feeling of our server, And were you want to be all day and night long to become the LEGEND of our server,
So why is this server great? And why should you play the server?
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/24ctjs7.jpg[/img]
• Professional and known staff • 24/7 Active Pking • 24/7 Uptime [No Lagg] • Pk-points with rewards • ::train command for new players • Great support staff & development team • Duel arena • Fight caves • Minigames • Donator island with great benefits • Active pking area • PvP weapons, Chaotics, Dragon claws, Hand cannon, Custom colored whips • Barrows • Fully Working Skilling & Combat System • Oppertunities to grow • Fast growing community • Wiki • Easy to start playing • Active forums • Dicing • Free For All for different kind of party’s • All kind of bosses • Auto Vote • Great vote rewards • Lots of donation items • FFA for events!
And we got so much more to offer that i kind even put it all here.
Of course Pking is the one of the most important things we got on the server thats why we wanted that one of the most fun things to do with a 100 % working switches and curses and different kinds of mage books to get the best pk experience you have ever wanted to have, And to reward your hard work of fighting and the time you have go true to become the number one pker of Novation we got made a shop to change the pk points you won in to great items you can sell or use to train or to become a better pker. But because we don’t want to leave the other people behind we made a vote shop to change the tickets you voted for in to great items that you can use or sell to the community and of course to show to the community what you have earned!
Well i can keep on telling you why you should join and become a part of the community. The best way to real know what Novation is, just come over and see for yourself!
[u][b]Upcoming Updates[/b][/u]
-Bloodlust Pking clans -Zombie Minigame (like Battlescape) -Hunger Games
[u][b]Server Info[/b][/u].
[u][b]Forums:[/b][/u] http://www.norvation-ps.com
[u][b]Client Download:[/b][/u]
- [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51578433/Novation%20V1.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51578433/Novation%20V1.rar[/url]
- [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51578433/Novation%20V1.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51578433/Novation%20V1.zip[/url]
If you have any problems with Client Post on forums, Thank you.
